glsa.title: D-Bus: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability has been found in D-Bus which allows a local user to cause a Denial of Service.

background.p: D-Bus is a message bus system which processes can use to talk to each other.

description.p: D-Busâ€™ _dbus_printf_string_upper_bound() function crashes if it returns exactly 1024 bytes.

impact.p: A local attacker could provide specially-crafted input to an application using D-Bus which would cause _dbus_printf_string_upper_bound() to return 1024 bytes and crash, causing a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
